questions.text: What is the primary goal of Housing Integration?

options.B: Foster community inclusion and long‑term stability

questions.explanation: The policy aims at social inclusion, stigma reduction, and stability.

questions.text: Which action best supports re‑establishing healthy social norms?

options.B: Facilitate neighbor introductions and accompany clients to events

questions.explanation: Building community ties and exposure to activities supports norms and inclusion.

questions.text: Why accompany clients on public transportation initially?

options.B: To familiarize clients with routes to resources

questions.explanation: Orientation builds confidence and access to community resources.
